localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Qubely is a full-fledged Gutenberg block toolkit with plenty of custom blocks, predefined sections and starter packs to create beautiful web pages. It minimizes the limitations of the Gutenberg editor and opens unlimited possibilities.
blogPost.body: Qubely is a full-fledged Gutenberg block toolkit with plenty of custom blocks, predefined sections and starter packs to create beautiful web pages. It minimizes the limitations of the Gutenberg editor and opens unlimited possibilities.
blogPost.title: Qubely - WordPress Gutenberg blocks and page builder
blogPost.author: Kevin David

localize.description: Qubely是一个成熟的古腾堡块工具包，它拥有大量的自定义块、预定义部分和启动包，可以创建漂亮的网页。它最大限度地减少了古腾堡编辑器的局限性，开启了无限的可能性。
localize.tagline: WordPress古腾堡块和页面构建器

localize.description: Qubely是一個成熟的古騰堡塊工具包，它擁有大量的自定義塊、預定義部分和啓動包，可以創建漂亮的網頁。它最大限度地減少了古騰堡編輯器的侷限性，開啓了無限的可能性。
localize.tagline: WordPress古騰堡塊和頁面構建器

previous.excerpt: Runops is a command-line app that lets you query databases and manage servers using a single tool. It adds Git versioning, reviews in Slack, and sensitive data masking to every command you run from the terminal.
previous.title: Runops - Run one-off scripts as production-ready automations

localize.description: Runops是一款命令行应用，让你可以用一个工具查询数据库和管理服务器。它为你从终端运行的每一条命令增加了Git版本管理、Slack中的审查和敏感数据屏蔽功能。
localize.tagline: 将一次性脚本作为生产就绪的自动程序运行

localize.description: Runops是一款命令行應用，讓你可以用一個工具查詢數據庫和管理服務器。它爲你從終端運行的每一條命令增加了Git版本管理、Slack中的審查和敏感數據屏蔽功能。
localize.tagline: 將一次性腳本作爲生產就緒的自動程序運行

next.excerpt: RevOps Deal Studio lets you easily build the perfect sales agreement templates with our block editor and end the hassle of copying and pasting from one agreement to the next. To help you get started, check out our gallery of pre-made templates.
next.title: RevOps Deal Studio - Building blocks for better sales agreements

localize.description: RevOps Deal Studio可以让您使用我们的模块编辑器轻松建立完美的销售协议模板，并结束了从一个协议到另一个协议的复制和粘贴的麻烦。为了帮助您入门，请查看我们的预制模板库。
RevOps Deal Studio可以讓您使用我們的模塊編輯器輕鬆建立完美的銷售協議模板，並結束了從一個協議到另一個協議的複製和粘貼的麻煩。爲了幫助您入門，請查看我們的預製模板庫。
